body: This story is pure fucking depression injected into my veins. I read some of the most fucked up shit on this site and absolutely love it but this made me want to off myself lol. I couldn’t tell you why because this is pretty tame. The writer is really good so I think the characters depression hit too close to home for me since I’m a maniacally depressed person.

I notice this is the last chapter for season 1, so overall after reading the entire plot, I have a better solution to their problems. Apologies! Does the term apology not exist in this manhwa?! The wife could apologize to her husband and her sister for not telling them the truth that she only started her relationship with her husband is because her sister loves him not her and only starting falling for him during later on in their relationship. The husband could apologize to his wife and his sister-in-law for ruining their life hurting them by reminding them his wife's past and for implanting a bad memory to his sister-in-law's head because it's not his fault that he was drunk when this happened. Lastly, the sister-in-law could apologize to her sister and her brother-in-law for disrupting their relationship and didn't told them that them being in love was hurting her because she loves the man wanting to get involved. Then they forgive each others and have threesome with problems fixed!
What the fuck? They could have had a threesome instead of abandoning each other at the end of chapter 38.
Good thing the building owner wasnt a scumbag. He could have made her his sex slave till she moves out
The part where she fucked the owner for rent was hotm i wonder where I can find more of that.
The melodrama is strong in this one. Didn't need 900 fucking pages to tell us they both cheated.
And there is no such thing as nerory  the correct term is netori and the story is nothing like that here
Bad tagging, this has nothing like netorare, cheating, nerory at least, bot no netorare....
There is no netorare in it as susual its wrongly tagged
